full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YUL LHA'I GSOL MCHOD LHA NGO MI NGO 'PHROD PA'I DGA' STON BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES GANG DU 'GRO BA'I PHYOGS KYI YUL LHA'I GSOL MCHOD LHA NGO MI NGO 'PHROD DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR DENG SANG YUL DUS KYI DBANG LAM SO SO'I 'DOD SBYAR GYI SGAR MTHA' YAS PA ZHIG SNANG BA'I, DO BZOD 'BRING DGOS MI DRUG KYANG, GCIG TU PHYOGS 'GRO LTA BUR 'DRE 'DRA DE DGOS PA, BYUNG TSE YE GE MANG PO ZHIG BKLAGS KYANG LAS 'BREL MED DANG, PHAL CHER SPYIR KHYAB PA MA ME ZHIG LAS SHING THOGS MDZUG GU LTAR NA NANG THOGS TU KHEL NGES SHIG MI YONG 'DUG PAS DE 'DRAR PHAN PA SRID SNYAM NAS, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES ZAB RGYAS MANG PO MA BSRES SHING, @006B MIG GSAL GYI RIGS NGOR TE SKABS DON 'DREL BAR BKOD PA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
